channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Thomas Van Hoey | Sinologica

item.title: Ideophones
item.description: The main goal of my PhD is to describe the development of Chinese ideophones from three perspectives: form, meaning, and use. This is a rather vague and big research topic, which is why I divide my work in subprojects, that eventually should glide into one coherent whole.
